text:
Is it possible to edit the build-in datepicker (Pikaday) in HubSpot-forms?
I need change the first day of the week to Monday, and make Saturday and Sunday not selectable.
you might be able to but it is trash and not worth your time
You are better off using custom date fields month, day, year and using select drop downs
Thanks for the answer, that what I was thinking as well :stuck_out_tongue:
